name: Mr. Marmite
initialDescription: You look at him from across the street, you are utterly fixated by him, his curves have captured your eye and won't let go. He catches your gaze and smiles
endDescriptionBad: You are not worthy of Mr. Marmites powers
endDescriptionGood: Mr. Marmite absorbs your soul, you are one, he is you, and you... are him
